diff: -          If we're on Windows, we have to munge the time up to 2 secs to
-          be able to check file modification times.
-          (Windows has a max resolution of two secs for modification times)
+          We have to munge the time to allow for the filesystem time

members.signatureBeforeChange: public String[] restrict(String[] files, File srcDir, File destDir,                              FileNameMapper mapper)
members.signatureAfterChange: public String[] restrict(String[] files, File srcDir, File destDir,                              FileNameMapper mapper)
diff: +          If we're on Windows, we have to munge the time up to 2 secs to
+          be able to check file modification times.
+          (Windows has a max resolution of two secs for modification times)
